sentences.english: Our new student Residential College specially designed for the use of the UNSW Foundation Year is now open.
sentences.chinese: 专供新南威尔士大学预科使用的住宿区即将开放。

sentences.english: The White Mountain School curriculum is college preparatory and offers an honors program by department.

sentences.english: Designed 1968 as a pre-university course of study with external examinations.
sentences.chinese: 创立于1968年，最初作为大学预科测试的一部分。
